props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultPage
props.description:
The value of the page that should be active when initially rendered.

Use when you do not need to control the value state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with item

props.name: page
props.description: The controlled value of the current page. Can be binded as `v-model:page`.

props.name: showEdges
props.description: When `true`, always show first page, last page, and ellipsis

props.name: siblingCount
props.description: Number of sibling should be shown around the current page

props.name: total
props.description: Number of items in your list

events.name: update:page
events.description: Event handler called when the page value changes
